main_caption.message: Sync Code Place with your Github.

github_auth_request.message: Authenticate Github to use Code Place Hub.

connect_repo_info.message: Connect your Github repository to Code Place Hub.

toast_disabled.message: Code Place Hub is disabled. Skipping upload.

toast_incomplete_setup.message: Code Place Hub setup incomplete. Open the extension and finish setup.

toast_ready_upload.message: Your code will be uploaded to Github when it's accepted.

toast_processing_upload.message: Uploading your code to Github, Please wait...

toast_successful_upload.message: Your code has been uploaded to Github.

toast_duplicate_upload.message: Your code has already been submitted.
